metadata.title: CVE-2017-17516 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: scripts/inspect_webbrowser.py in Reddit Terminal Viewer (RTV) 1.19.0 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: rtv package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
